Menace, vigilance
Whenever another creature dies, you may exile a noncreature card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if this creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it and only as a sorcery.
